radiographic_examinations.findings: large left adrenal mass and a second tumor in the hilus of the liver with pheochromocytoma.
uptake of the adrenal mass but only marginally of the second tumor.
complete ischemic infarction of the left kidney.
showed a 2-cm mass in the right adrenal gland.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: This lesion was operated using adrenal sparing endoscopic surgery.

radiographic_examinations.findings: left carotid body tumor showed slight growth.
remaining head and neck paragangliomas did not grow over 8 years.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Currently, at age 37 years, catecholamines remain normal.
